boardgame.name: Asgard
boardgame.description: Note: There are updated official rules from the publisher that clear up many of the rules questions that arise from rules in the box. It is highly recommended that players use the latest rules for learning/teaching the game. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;a target='_blank' href=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;http://www.whatsyourgame.eu/downloads/Asgard_rules.pdf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; rel=_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;nofollow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;http://www.whatsyourgame.eu/downloads/Asgard_rules.pdf_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;/a_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The end of days is close. Darkness and light will clash._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;All Gods know what this means for them. Blood ties will no longer be respected, brother will fight against brother, and no man will spare another. Odin, Freyja, T_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;yacute;r, Loki, Hel, Thor, and Baldr forge their plans and promise great rewards to the ones who will help them prevail. Eventually Fenrir, M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;mir, and Surtr will join the battle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ask for help at the right time, and the gods will grant you their powers. Will you ask Freyja to recruit the fallen warriors of Valhalla, or will you use the cunning of Loki and Hel to make an opponent's armies die or switch sides at a critical moment? Will you ask T_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;yacute;r to help win a decisive battle, or will you consult M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;mir's wisdom in order to gain a tactical advantage?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Asgard, you want to support the gods by erecting temples and by convincing brave warriors and mighty giants to side with them. You can influence which god will fight which during the final battle _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Ragnar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ouml;k _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; the outcome of which will depend on how well you strengthened their armies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Beware, only a few of them will come out victorious. Will you side with the right ones? As a mortal, your place in the new world depends on it._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: One time played.
English first edition
In shrink, purchased at BGG Con 2012. If paying by check or non-paypal, will ship after payment is cleared/received. I will cover any shipping costs.

What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Your Game? (WYG0001) The end of days is close. Darkness and light will clash. All Gods know what this means for them. Blood ties will no longer be respected, brother will fight against brother, and no man will spare another. Odin, Freyja, Týr, Loki, Hel, Thor, and Baldr forge their plans and promise great rewards to the ones who will help them prevail. Eventually Fenrir, Mímir, and Surtr will join the battle. Ask for help at the right time, and the gods will grant you their powers. Will you ask Freyja to recruit the fallen warriors of Valhalla, or will you use the cunning of Loki and Hel to make an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s armies die or switch sides at a critical moment? Will you ask Týr help to win a decisive battle, or will you consult Mímir_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wisdom in order to gain a tactical advantage? Support the gods by erecting temples and by convincing brave warriors and mighty giants to side with them. You can influence which god will fight which during the final battle - Ragnarök - the outcome of which will depend on how well you strengthened their armies. Beware, only a few of them will come out victorious. Will you side with the right ones? As a mortal, your place in the new world depends on it.

What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Your Game? (WYG0001) The end of days is close. Darkness and light will clash. All Gods know what this means for them. Blood ties will no longer be respected, brother will fight against brother, and no man will spare another. Odin, Freyja, Týr, Loki, Hel, Thor, and Baldr forge their plans and promise great rewards to the ones who will help them prevail. Eventually Fenrir, Mímir, and Surtr will join the battle. Ask for help at the right time, and the gods will grant you their powers. Will you ask Freyja to recruit the fallen warriors of Valhalla, or will you use the cunning of Loki and Hel to make an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s armies die or switch sides at a critical moment? Will you ask Týr help to win a decisive battle, or will you consult Mímir_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wisdom in order to gain a tactical advantage? Support the gods by erecting temples and by convincing brave warriors and mighty giants to side with them. You can influence which god will fight which during the final battle - Ragnarök - the outcome of which will depend on how well you strengthened their armies. Beware, only a few of them will come out victorious. Will you side with the right ones? As a mortal, your place in the new world depends on it.

Opened but unplayed copy of Asgard The Village Geek is a brick and mortar comic/game store in McPherson, KS. We specialize in vintage comics, new/used video games, hobby board games, toys, and collectibles. We can combine shipping on items- just send us a message. Thanks for looking, and thanks for supporting a small business! We typically ship USPS Flat Rate Priority ($12.35), although if you would like a cheaper option, let us know. If it is cheaper to ship that way, we will refund you the difference (please do not message us asking for a specific shipping amount). Thanks!!!

I am offering the Boardgame : * ASGARD The Game is open, but new, unpunched and unplayed!! German 1st. Edition from Huch_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;friends! ---_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Shipment costs will be 4,65 Euro (Paket HERMES / Gemrany)! ---_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; EU-shipment 18,50 Euro (Paket DHL)! ---_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; other countrys - please ask for shipment options and costs! ____________________________________________________________
Like New, in mint condition. Ships Fedex Ground for $14 except for Alaska and Hawaii.
For now: for Cannedlemons Français / French no necessary in-game text Iello 1st edition (2013)

What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Your Game? (WYG0001) The end of days is close. Darkness and light will clash. All Gods know what this means for them. Blood ties will no longer be respected, brother will fight against brother, and no man will spare another. Odin, Freyja, Týr, Loki, Hel, Thor, and Baldr forge their plans and promise great rewards to the ones who will help them prevail. Eventually Fenrir, Mímir, and Surtr will join the battle. Ask for help at the right time, and the gods will grant you their powers. Will you ask Freyja to recruit the fallen warriors of Valhalla, or will you use the cunning of Loki and Hel to make an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s armies die or switch sides at a critical moment? Will you ask Týr help to win a decisive battle, or will you consult Mímir_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wisdom in order to gain a tactical advantage? Support the gods by erecting temples and by convincing brave warriors and mighty giants to side with them. You can influence which god will fight which during the final battle - Ragnarök - the outcome of which will depend on how well you strengthened their armies. Beware, only a few of them will come out victorious. Will you side with the right ones? As a mortal, your place in the new world depends on it.

Played once with my husband. He had nothing against the game, but he did not like the theme so I know it will never make it to the table again. Comes from a smoke-free home.

Beware, only a few of them will come out victorious. Will you side with the right ones? As a mortal, your place in the new world depends on it.

What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Your Game? (WYG0001) The end of days is close. Darkness and light will clash. All Gods know what this means for them. Blood ties will no longer be respected, brother will fight against brother, and no man will spare another. Odin, Freyja, Týr, Loki, Hel, Thor, and Baldr forge their plans and promise great rewards to the ones who will help them prevail. Eventually Fenrir, Mímir, and Surtr will join the battle. Ask for help at the right time, and the gods will grant you their powers. Will you ask Freyja to recruit the fallen warriors of Valhalla, or will you use the cunning of Loki and Hel to make an opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s armies die or switch sides at a critical moment? Will you ask Týr help to win a decisive battle, or will you consult Mímir_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s wisdom in order to gain a tactical advantage? Support the gods by erecting temples and by convincing brave warriors and mighty giants to side with them. You can influence which god will fight which during the final battle - Ragnarök - the outcome of which will depend on how well you strengthened their armies. Beware, only a few of them will come out victorious. Will you side with the right ones? As a mortal, your place in the new world depends on it.
